idea-plugin.name: Shell Filter
idea-plugin.description: The Shell Filter plugin for Jetbrains IDEs enables the developer to run an external shell command and insert or replace the returned output into the current Editor.

action.description: Filter a selection using a shell execution or insert text from a shell execution.
Filter a selection using a shell execution or insert text from a shell execution by directly specifying a custom command.
